Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) electrolytes are currently manufactured from yttria stabilised zirconia.
Titulo: Characterisation of Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9/3Y-TZP composite electrolytes-Effects of 3Y-TZP particle treatment

Sentencas: A limitation of this material is the high operating temperatures needed for efficient operation, approximately 1000degreesC, as this can lead to sealing problems and require expensive nickel/chromium alloy auxiliary components.
Titulo: Characterisation of Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9/3Y-TZP composite electrolytes-Effects of 3Y-TZP particle treatment

Sentencas: Alternative electrolytes, which allow operation at reduced temperatures, such as gadolinium doped cerium oxide have been suggested.
Titulo: Characterisation of Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9/3Y-TZP composite electrolytes-Effects of 3Y-TZP particle treatment

Sentencas: However these ceramic materials often exhibit inferior mechanical properties.
Titulo: Characterisation of Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9/3Y-TZP composite electrolytes-Effects of 3Y-TZP particle treatment

Sentencas: In this paper the manufacture and characterisation of composite electrolytes consisting of 3% yttria stabilised zirconia particles in a 20% gadolinia doped ceria matrix is described.
Titulo: Characterisation of Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9/3Y-TZP composite electrolytes-Effects of 3Y-TZP particle treatment

Sentencas: Results suggest improvements in strength can be achieved by the composite approach.
Titulo: Characterisation of Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9/3Y-TZP composite electrolytes-Effects of 3Y-TZP particle treatment
